trans-unit.source: Exposes an Item through the editing context for managing the list of referenced and local assemblies that will be used inside the workflow for controls such as the expression editor to determine the list of references.
trans-unit.target: 透過管理參考組件與本機組件之清單的編輯內容公開項目，這些組件將會用於工作流程內部，讓運算式編輯器之類的控制項可以決定參考的清單。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.AssemblyContextControlItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.AssemblyContextControlItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection that contains the display names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment in addition to the display name of the local project assembly.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合，這個集合除了本機專案組件的顯示名稱之外，還包含已載入環境之所有組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the display names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment in addition to the display name of the local project assembly.
trans-unit.target: 集合，這個集合除了本機專案組件的顯示名稱之外，還包含已載入環境之所有組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The multi-targeting service used to get the proper version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
trans-unit.target: 多目標服務用來取得已載入之組件的正確版本，這個組件會對應到目前專案的目標 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently loaded assembly using the multi-targeting support service.
trans-unit.target: 使用多目標支援服務傳回目前載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件。

trans-unit.source: If `multiTargetingService` is `null`, this method loads the assembly from the specified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 如果`multiTargetingService`是`null`，這個方法會從指定的組件名稱載入組件。

trans-unit.source: The multi-targeting service used to get the proper versions of the loaded assemblies that correspond to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] of the current project.
trans-unit.target: 多目標服務用來取得已載入之組件的正確版本，這些組件會對應到目前專案的目標 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已載入環境之所有組件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 已載入環境之所有組件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection that contains the assembly names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合，這個集合包含已載入環境之所有組件的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the assembly names of all the assemblies that have been loaded in the environment.
trans-unit.target: 集合，這個集合包含已載入環境之所有組件的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets an item type.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains the item type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含項目類型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the local assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定本機組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> that contains the local assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含本機組件名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the referenced assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定參考的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> that contains the referenced assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含參考之組件名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />。
